LanguageData.Hediffs_MiningLv1.description: Saikutsu (Mining) Knowhow Tip 1: Level 2 of Saikutsu (Mining) Knowhow has a short term buff tied to it.

LanguageData.Hediffs_MiningLv2.description: Saikutsu (Mining) Knowhow Tip 2: Level 3 & 4 of this buff grant permanent buffs.
LanguageData.Hediffs_Mining.label: Mining Knowhow
LanguageData.Hediffs_Mining.description: Saikutsu (Mining) Knowhow: I eat with gratitude for all the ingredients in the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
